# kops_topology_spec

| attribute | type | optional/required | computed |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `masters` | String | Required |  |
| `nodes` | String | Required |  |
| `bastion` | [BastionSpec](./BastionSpec.generated.md) | Optional |  |
| `dns` | [DNSSpec](./DNSSpec.generated.md) | Required |  |
